Currently the company has the largest number of self-owned branded exhibitions, and introduced the most international branded exhibitions in China.In order to meet the development needs of the rapid industry transformation under the new economic situation, VNU Exhibitions Asia will adopt a comprehensive strategic plan for its group development and global deployment. In the future, the company will be driven by information technologies and innovation, continue to take advantage of its ability to integrate resources, and further explore the core fields within the four major sections of construction, lifestyle, agriculture and industry. VNU Exhibitions Asia will strive to create a new China model leading the global exhibition industry.
